sourceOrganization.name: NIAID FEND for TB program
sourceOrganization.abstract: Feasibility of Novel Diagnostics for TB in Endemic Countries (FEND for TB) supports the evaluation of early-stage diagnostic tools and novel strategies to improve tuberculosis detection in high-burden settings. The program aims to address the urgent need for more effective and accessible tuberculosis diagnostics.
sourceOrganization.description: The goal of the Feasibility of Novel Diagnostics for TB in Endemic Countries (FEND for TB) program is to support the evaluation of early-stage diagnostics and novel diagnostic strategies for tuberculosis to address an urgent need for improved diagnostics.  For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/fendtb
alternateName: Feasibility of Novel Diagnostics for TB
